gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Clippers 113, Hornets 104
gameRecap.excerpt: The Clippers defeated the Hornets, 113-104. James Harden led the way for the Clippers with 29 points, six rebounds, eight assists and six 3PM, while Paul George added 25 points, four rebounds, four assists and five 3PM in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied 21 points, 11 rebounds and five assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Clippers improve to 18-12 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 7-21.
